text: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا

translation.en: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart
translation.id: Dan katakanlah, "Kebenaran telah datang dan yang batil telah lenyap." Sungguh, yang batil itu pasti lenyap
